OOC: Sorry if you took it that way. I just was up to the challenge of the C=
ybers. I still would like to battle the Cybers if Tankor wants to...

  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 2:34 AM
  Subject: Re: DevilDuer


=
  Ok, guys, relax. Proto did come up with the original idea, but he left ea=
rly on, right before Firestorm, the final original founder. Almost everyone=
 (no offence, Proto) has been here longer than he has, but that's really no=
 reason to start up fights.

  While I'm at it, I'm going to criticize all =
the faction bashing that's been going on. Some factions are stronger than o=
thers, but that's no reason to bash each other about them. In fact, I'm goi=
ng to go clear out all the polls about that in an effort to promote peace a=
mongst RPGers :-). Anyways, quit bashing each other's factions. It gets ext=
remely annoying reading through 10 or so "My guys can whoop your guys" post=
s with absolutely no point to them.

  PS. If you really wanna argue about =
something, email the person, don't spam the RPG!


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "S=
oulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > OOC: Oh, really? Then why did you=
 bail out before? I've posted every day (except for days I didn't feel well=
 or on special occasions that I shouldn't post on) since I've arrived. So i=
n reality, counting up all of the time, I've still been here longer than yo=
u have...
